document.title: New Project Wizards
document.paragraph:
For the most part, EiffelEnvision New ../projects.xmlProjects are autonomous, requiring no user interaction. This section of the documentation highlights the new EiffelEnvision projects that require interaction and hence further explanation.
in_this_section2In This Sectionempty_project.xmlEmpty Project Configurable empty project, with rudimentary options. For creating applications or libraries by specifying the root class and creation routine. blank_eiffel_graphical_application.xmlBlank Eiffel Graphical Application A stand-alone Windows application using the ../../../../../../libraries/wel/index.xmlEiffelVision 2 platform independent graphical library. windows_eiffel_application.xmlEiffel Windows Application A stand-alone Windows application using the ../../../../../../libraries/wel/index.xmlWindows Eiffel Library (WEL). eiffel_class_library.xmlEiffel Class (Precompile) Library Reusable class or component that can be shared with other projects, specifically designed for reuse by other EiffelEnvision projects. Eiffel Class Library projects are also known in Eiffel as ../../configuring/adding_references/precompiled_libraries.xmlPrecompiled Libraries. also_see2Related SectionsSee also../index.xmlAdding New Projects../projects.xmlEiffelEnvision Projectsms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxurfNewProjectDialog.htmNew Project Dialogms-help//MS.VSCC.2003/MS.MSDNQTR.2003FEB.1033/vsintro7/html/vxconvisualstudiosolutionsprojects.htmIntroduction to Solutions, Projects, and Items
